statements: SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_phone = '123-456-7890';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 100;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id BETWEEN 2 AND 5 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE LENGTH(customer_phone) > 10;
SELECT customer_name, length(customer_email) AS email_length FROM customers WHERE customer_phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM Orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM Customers JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM Customers JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id WHERE Orders.total_amount > 5000;
SELECT customer_name, email, order_date FROM Customers JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'Alice';
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT order_id, customer_id, total_amount, order_date FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id WHERE o.total_amount > 5000;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM Orders GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT product_name, category, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM Products p JOIN Reviews r ON p.product_id = r.product_id GROUP BY p.product_id, category;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT Orders.order_id, Customers.first_name, Orders.total_amount FROM Orders INNER JOIN Customers ON Orders.customer_id = Customers.customer_id WHERE Orders.total_amount > 1000;
SELECT Products.product_name, Products.price, Reviews.rating FROM Products INNER JOIN Reviews ON Products.product_id = Reviews.product_id WHERE Reviews.rating >= 4 ORDER BY Products.price DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE first_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_total FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT note_id, note_text, note_date FROM customer_notes WHERE customer_id = 2 ORDER BY note_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT order_id, order_total, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_status = 'Shipped';
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, note_text, note_date FROM customers JOIN customer_notes ON customers.customer_id = customer_notes.customer_id WHERE note_date > '2020-01-01';
